snippet: Digital subscriptions continued to grow, and digital advertising increased at a double-digit pace.
abstract: New York Times Co posts first-quarter net loss of $14 million, pushed down by pension settlement charge and decline in print ad revenue; adjusted profit grows to $59 million for quarter, up from $57 million in year-earlier period.
lead_paragraph: Digital subscriptions continued to grow, and digital advertising increased at a double-digit pace.

headline.main: Times Co. Reports a Loss, Tempered by Digital Growth
headline.print_headline: Times Co. Posts a Loss, Tempered by Digital Growth
